title: Werewolf

fields.name: Hunting Moon Enchancement:
fields.value:
Canine Origins
Learn everyone who visited you at any point in the game who is still alive, alongside their faction. You will not learn other Weres

desc:
Post 527
*The OG killer...*
Abilities
- During a Full Moon, rampage at your target's house.
- During a New Moon, Mark another player's house
Attributes
- If you don't select a target, you will rampage at your own house on Full Moon Nights.
- You have Detection Immunity, but only during non-Full Moon Nights.
- You have a night chat with other Weres
- Marking a house will roleblock all visitors that night.
